location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant Robert Taylor, in charge at the Bushire Residency to Stephen Babbington, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the property belonging to the late Aga Mahomed Bhubarny at Bushire, which is reported as being limited to two houses. It is noted that Mahomed Neuby Kaun [Muḥammad Nabī Khān] has been directed by Muḥammad Ja‘afar Khān, the Governor of Bushire, to seize the property in question. As for the ship sold at Bussora [Basra], it is explained that it is the Lieutenant's understanding that the Bussora Residency has supplied the Bombay Government with all the required information.
